title: article 1
content: typing is a useful skill. it helps us work faster on computers. when we type without looking at the keyboard, we can focus better on the screen. practice helps us type faster and make fewer mistakes. most people can type about 40 words per minute. some fast typists can do more than 60 words per minute. good typing needs both speed and accuracy. proper hand position helps prevent injury. many schools now teach typing because it is important for using computers. with practice, anyone can become better at typing.

title: article 2
content: cats are great pets. they are clean and quiet animals. most cats like to sleep during the day. at night, they become more active. cats can see well in the dark. they use their whiskers to help them move around. cats love to chase toys and play games. they clean themselves by licking their fur. many cats enjoy sitting in warm sunny spots. cats make good friends for people who live in small homes.

title: article 3
content: computers help us do many things. we use them to write, play games, and talk to friends. computers can solve hard math problems very fast. they help us find information on the internet. many phones are like small computers. we can take pictures and watch videos with them. computers make work easier in offices and schools. they help doctors treat sick people. computers are getting better every year.

title: article 4
content: the weather is changing around the world. summers are getting hotter. winters have more storms. some places get less rain than before. ice at the north and south poles is melting. this makes the sea level rise. we need to help fix these problems. using less power helps. walking or riding bikes instead of driving cars is good. planting trees also helps. we must act now to protect our earth.

title: article 5
content: our brain helps us think and feel. it controls everything we do. the brain has many parts that work together. it helps us remember things we learn. it lets us see, hear, and touch things. when we sleep, our brain is still working. it helps us feel happy or sad. the brain can learn new things at any age. taking care of our brain is important for staying healthy.

title: article 6
content: space is very big and full of stars. people send rockets into space to learn about it. some robots are on mars looking for signs of life. big telescopes take pictures of far away stars. astronauts live in a space station and do science tests. some people want to build houses on the moon. we might find new things in space that can help earth. space travel is getting easier and cheaper.

title: article 7
content: music makes people happy. it can help us feel better when we are sad. some people like to dance when they hear music. others like to sing along. music can be loud or soft. it can be fast or slow. many people learn to play instruments like piano or guitar. we can listen to music on phones and computers. music is part of all cultures around the world.

title: article 8
content: exercise keeps us healthy. walking is good exercise. running makes our hearts stronger. swimming uses many muscles. riding bikes is fun exercise. playing sports helps us stay fit. exercise can make us feel happy. it helps us sleep better at night. doing exercise with friends is more fun. a little exercise every day is good for everyone.

title: article 9
content: food gives us energy to live. we need different kinds of food to stay healthy. fruits and vegetables are good for us. drinking water is very important. some foods help us grow strong. other foods help us think better. cooking food makes it taste better. sharing meals with friends is fun. eating slowly helps us enjoy food more. good food helps us stay healthy.

title: article 10
content: trees help make clean air for us to breathe. they give homes to birds and animals. trees give us shade on hot days. some trees give us fruit to eat. leaves fall from trees in autumn. new leaves grow in spring. trees need water and sun to grow. old trees can be very tall. planting new trees helps our earth. we should take care of trees.

title: article 11
content: reading books is fun and helpful. books can teach us new things. stories take us to different places. we can read about real people and made-up characters. reading helps us learn new words. it makes our imagination stronger. some books have pictures to help tell the story. libraries have many books we can borrow. reading every day helps us become better readers.

title: article 12
content: the ocean is full of life. fish swim in big groups. whales are the biggest animals in the sea. dolphins like to jump and play. coral reefs are home to many sea creatures. waves move the water up and down. the ocean is very deep in some places. sailors use boats to cross the ocean. we need to keep the ocean clean. many people enjoy visiting the beach.

title: article 13
content: art helps us show how we feel. we can draw pictures with pencils and crayons. painting lets us use many colors. some people make art with clay. others take photos with cameras. art can be big or small. museums show art from different times. making art is fun for everyone. we can share our art with others. art makes the world more beautiful.

title: article 14
content: friends make life more fun. good friends help each other. we can talk to friends about our problems. playing games with friends is fun. friends can teach us new things. some friends we meet at school. other friends live in our neighborhood. making new friends takes time. being kind helps us keep friends. friends are important in our lives.

title: article 15
content: sleep helps our bodies stay healthy. most people sleep at night. dreams happen when we sleep. our bodies grow when we sleep. getting enough sleep helps us learn better. being tired makes it hard to focus. going to bed at the same time helps. quiet rooms are good for sleeping. waking up early gives us time to get ready. good sleep makes us feel better.

title: article 16
content: gardens grow many plants. flowers make gardens pretty. vegetables from gardens are fresh to eat. bees like to visit gardens. butterflies come to drink flower nectar. gardens need water to grow well. pulling weeds helps plants grow better. some gardens are very big. others fit in small spaces. working in gardens is good exercise.

title: article 17
content: the sun gives us light and heat. it helps plants grow food. the sun rises in the morning. it sets in the evening. clouds sometimes hide the sun. the sun is very far from earth. it is much bigger than our planet. we need sunscreen to protect our skin. the sun is like a big star. it gives energy to all life on earth.

title: article 18
content: animals live all over the world. some animals live in hot places. others like cold weather better. many animals make their homes in trees. some dig holes in the ground. animals eat different kinds of food. they take care of their babies. some animals sleep during winter. others move to warmer places. we should be kind to all animals.

title: article 19
content: robots help people do work. they can move things in factories. some robots clean floors in homes. others help build cars. robots can go places too dangerous for people. they can work without getting tired. some robots look like humans. others look like machines. robots are getting smarter every year. they make many jobs easier.

title: article 20
content: writing helps us share our ideas. we can write stories about anything. letters help us talk to people far away. making lists helps us remember things. writing in a diary is like talking to yourself. good writing takes practice. spelling words right is important. writing can be fun and creative. sharing our writing helps others learn. everyone can become a better writer.
